ValidationRule.description:
This Validation Rule informs users of the blank fields they must complete prior to updating a Waybilling Issue Case to Closed Status.
Deactivated on 6/14/2018 - Duplicate of NS_CaseClosureInfoRequired (WJD)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,'Waybilling Issue') , ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed') , NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True,
or( ISBLANK(NS_ReasonForError__c) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete Reason for Error prior to closing the Case.
